QuestData.Title: The Taking of Dusklight Bridge
QuestData.Description: Let's press these insects back across the bridge and break their spirits!$B$BFollow my lead.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Lao-Chin the Iron Belly hold the far side of the Dusklight Bridge.
QuestData.RewardText: The mantid aren't likely to return soon after a beating like that... and now Lao-Chin is free to join us in the hunt.
